metadata.title: BurstPick — AI-Powered Burst Photo Culling, Built by Photographers
metadata.description: Built by photographers who shoot 10,000+ frames per session. BurstPick uses on-device AI to cluster your burst sequences, rank them by sharpness, exposure, and composition — so you spend less time culling and more time behind the lens.

hero.tagline: AI-powered burst photo culling, built by photographers
hero.description: We shoot 10,000+ frames per session and got tired of culling by hand. So we built BurstPick — on-device AI that clusters your burst sequences, ranks them by sharpness, exposure, and composition, and surfaces your best candidates. You make the final call.

showcase.heading: Built by Photographers, for Photographers
showcase.description: We know the burst workflow because we live it — wildlife action sequences, indoor sports at 30fps, event coverage with thousands of frames. BurstPick was born from that daily grind.

story.heading: From Thousands to Your Top Candidates
story.description: Every shoot produces hundreds of near-identical frames. BurstPick clusters, scores, and ranks them — surfacing your strongest candidates in seconds, not hours. You make the final call.
story.before_desc: Hundreds of near-identical burst shots filling your screen — where do you even start?
story.after_desc: Your top candidates ranked by sharpness, exposure, and composition — ready for your review

features.heading: Why BurstPick?
features.subheading: Everything you need to go from thousands of burst shots to your best candidates — AI-powered, entirely on your Mac.
features.clustering_desc: No more scrolling through 200 near-identical frames. BurstPick recognizes each burst sequence and groups it for you — so you start with organized sets, not a wall of thumbnails.
features.scoring_desc: Every photo is scored on sharpness, exposure, noise, composition, and face quality. The strongest candidates rise to the top — you just confirm or override.
features.raw_desc: ARW, CR2, CR3, NEF, DNG, and 21 more RAW formats — plus HEIC, HEIF, AVIF, WebP, and JPEG XL. Bring your files straight from the card.
features.face_title: Find Every Face in the Shoot
features.face_desc: Automatically detects faces and groups them by person across your entire session. Perfect for events — find every shot of a specific subject in seconds.
features.compare_desc: Put up to 4 finalists next to each other with synced zoom and color-accurate previews. See the difference that matters — down to the pixel.
features.workflow_desc: Keep, reject, star-rate, color-label — every decision autosaves. Your originals are never touched, never moved, never deleted.
features.lightroom_desc: Export your picks as XMP sidecars or straight into a Lightroom Classic catalog. Photo Mechanic → BurstPick → Lightroom — no extra steps.
features.c2pa_desc: Full C2PA content credentials support — provenance and authenticity metadata are preserved throughout your workflow. GDPR compliant by design: zero data collection, zero tracking. ICC color management ensures accurate color across your pipeline.

gallery.heading: See BurstPick in Action
gallery.subheading: A streamlined interface designed for speed and accuracy.
gallery.main_ui_desc: Clusters on the left, your selected photo front and center, filmstrip at the bottom — everything one glance away
gallery.clustering_desc: Each burst sequence grouped automatically — scroll through sets, not hundreds of loose frames
gallery.scoring_desc: Every photo ranked by sharpness, exposure, and composition — adjust the weights to match how you shoot
gallery.compare_desc: Put your top picks side by side with synced zoom — spot the winner instantly
gallery.persons_desc: Every person in your shoot, grouped automatically — jump straight to the subject you need

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: BurstPick supports 26 RAW formats (ARW, CR2, CR3, NEF, DNG, ORF, RW2, RAF, and more), plus HEIC, HEIF, JPG, PNG, TIFF, AVIF, WebP, and JPEG XL.
faq.a2: BurstPick is free during the beta. After launch, it will be $89 one-time — no subscription, no recurring fees. Your license is yours forever.
faq.a3: macOS 14 (Sonoma) or later. Works on both Apple Silicon and Intel Macs.
faq.q4: Does it require an internet connection?
faq.a4: No. All ML inference runs entirely on your Mac. No photos leave your device — ever.
faq.q5: How many ML models does it use?
faq.a5: 20+ models covering image quality, aesthetics, similarity embeddings, face recognition, VLM assessment, and image classification. All hot-swappable via the settings panel.
faq.a6: Never. BurstPick uses a non-destructive workflow. Export creates hard links to save disk space — your originals stay untouched.
faq.a7: Yes. Export Keep/Reject decisions and star ratings as XMP sidecar files, or export directly to a Lightroom Classic catalog.
faq.a8: BurstPick is built by a team of photographers and macOS engineers who shoot 10,000+ frames per session. We built it because we needed it — existing tools didn't understand burst-specific workflows.
faq.q9: How does BurstPick fit into my workflow?
faq.a9: BurstPick is a companion, not a replacement. Ingest with Photo Mechanic, pre-cull with BurstPick, edit in Lightroom. It slots right into the PM → LR pipeline with full XMP compatibility.
faq.a10: BurstPick is coming soon. Sign up for updates and be the first to know when it launches.

cta.heading: Get back to shooting, not sorting
cta.description: We built BurstPick because we were spending more time culling than shooting. 100% native macOS app — no subscription, no cloud. Your photos never leave your Mac.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: BurstPick is built for a local-first workflow. We designed the app so your photos and scoring data stay on your Mac.
privacyPage.localProcessingBody: All photo analysis, clustering, and ML scoring run locally on your device. Your photos are never uploaded to BurstPick servers.
privacyPage.dataCollectionBody: BurstPick does not collect personal data, usage analytics, crash analytics, tracking identifiers, or advertising identifiers.
privacyPage.permissionsBody: BurstPick requests file-system access and optional camera/photo library access only when needed for photo culling features.
privacyPage.retentionBody: Because BurstPick does not transmit your photos or personal data, there is no remote data retention by BurstPick.
privacyPage.thirdPartyBody: BurstPick does not use third-party analytics or tracking SDKs in the desktop app.
privacyPage.contactBody: If you have privacy questions, please reach out to our support team.

about.heading: Built Native. Runs On-Device.
about.description: BurstPick is a 100% native macOS application. Every line of code is written in Swift and SwiftUI, optimized for Apple Silicon, and designed to run entirely on your Mac — no cloud, no servers, no compromise.
about.native_desc: Built from the ground up with Swift and SwiftUI — not a web wrapper, not an Electron app. True native performance and a UI that feels right at home on your Mac.
about.ondevice_desc: All 20+ ML models run locally through CoreML and Vision frameworks. Your photos are analyzed, scored, and ranked without ever leaving your Mac.
about.silicon_desc: Leverages Metal GPU acceleration and the Neural Engine on Apple Silicon. Process 10,000+ photos in about 90 seconds on M-series chips.
about.privacy_desc: No account required, no internet connection needed, no data collection. BurstPick works completely offline — your photos stay yours.
